meanings.definition: To reorganize into a new grouping or formation.
meanings.sent1: After the game, the players regrouped to discuss their strategy for the next match.
meanings.sent2: The students regrouped into smaller study groups to work on the project together.
meanings.sent3: The toys regrouped on the shelf, planning their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: The scattered puzzle pieces regrouped to reveal a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The ants regrouped to carry the food back to their nest efficiently.

meanings.definition: To gather together again after being dispersed.
meanings.sent1: During the fire drill, the employees regrouped at the designated meeting point.
meanings.sent2: The hikers regrouped at the base of the mountain after exploring different trails.
meanings.sent3: The scattered birds regrouped on the tree branches, chirping happily.
meanings.sent4: The team regrouped like a flock of birds returning to their nest.
meanings.sent5: The lost friends regrouped at the park entrance, relieved to find each other.
